text:
@realDonaldTrump @Facebook AGAIN talking nonsense about Obama 
I tell you what please take Zuckerberg & get married together and keep kissing him till your lips melted 
and stay away from @BarackObama 
solve your problems w/o Obama or Twitter 
we have #covid19 & afraid to die 
&you talk about no logic
